scripts.frontend:dev: cd frontend && npm install && npm run dev
scripts.backend:dev: cd backend && python -m venv .venv && .venv\Scripts\activate.ps1 && pip install -r requirements.txt && python manage.py runserver
scripts.prod:deploy: docker-compose -f docker-compose.prod.yml up -d --build && npm run migrations
scripts.backend:deploy: docker compose up -d backend && npm run migrations
scripts.prod:update: docker-compose -f docker-compose.prod.yml up -d && npm run migrations
